Robert Lucente wrote:

> Googled and found http://www.w3.org/DOM/Test/Documents/DOMTSBuild.html.
>
> The above states, "If you get a out of memory error (very likely if you
> build the DOM Level 3 Core tests)". It then recommends "set
> ANT_OPTS=-Xmx512M". Request that people share how they solved their 
> "out of
> memory" issue.
>
> Humm. This does belong in JUnit ? Perhaps this is a generic Java 
> question ?

I wonder if this was a JUnit issue, or just manipulation of incredibly 
huge DOM objects.  It might have been both.  Anyone out there with more 
insight into this particular project?  Thanks,

    David Saff
